Subject: The Lion and the Unicorn (Sort of)
Message-ID: <8ram5j+tlme@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: wilddance_mare@...

Wildfire:




More days went on, hunting each other. Wildfire made herself the 
shadows and the night, while Rowdy Wolf was spooky things. He fought 
back with mech fluid and violence, while she fought back with being a 
ghost. 

She kicked her hooves at the wolf's head, hearing the bark of a tree 
shatter. Pieces of bark went flying. She turned her body around, ears 
pinned to her skull as she eyed the wolf down. Teeth flashed before 
her eyes. Mech fluid went flying from under her. Wildfire reared up, 
whinnying in distress. 

She cleared her mind within seconds, and when her hooves hit the 
ground, she saw nothing wrong with her. The Vok wolf was playing 
games. He learned hers. 

Kill you, she said. She chased after him. Megatron and the others 
took him lightly, and he was going to be proven danger.
